links.title: AAPL Apple Inc. Stock Quote
links.description: Apple Inc. designs, manufactures, and markets smartphones, personal computers, tablets, wearables, and accessories worldwide. It also sells various related services. In addition, the company offers iPhone, a line of smartphones; Mac, a line of personal computers; iPad, a line of multi-purpose tablets; AirPods Max, an over-ear wireless headphone; and wearables, home, and accessories comprising AirPods, Apple TV, Apple Watch, Beats products, HomePod, and iPod touch.

body: $SPY I know today was great bulls (and I was very happy with my trades today)  but be careful. If Omicron has the hint of shutting down China, the supply chain is going to have longer term problems. Also, if that happens, the product that moved off the shelves the last two quarters will need to be replaced at a much higher cost. This may take two quarters to show up, but please be wary. $QQQ $TSLA $AAPL
